title: ‘We Lost a Little, But We are Still There’: Can Quick-Step Reclaim its Classics Crown?
content:
'The big goal is always the classics': Tradition runs deep on the Belgian squad, with Luke Lamperti set for classics debut at Kuurne-Brussel-Kuurne.

Read the full article at ‘We Lost a Little, But We are Still There’: Can Quick-Step Reclaim its Classics Crown? on Velo.
author: ahood
